original_title: Sesame Street: Play with Me Sesame: Imagine with Me
overview: Featuring four chapters - "Up & Down," "Ernie Says," "Making Cookies," and "Perfect Pair - the Sesame Street gang is as fun and educational as ever in this DVD. A bonus CD-Rom provides another hour's worth of interactive learning.
title: Sesame Street: Play with Me Sesame: Imagine with Me
